trans-unit.source: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.Android app with Azure App Service
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.Android app with Azure App Service

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Azure App Service and Azure Notification Hubs to send push notifications to your Xamarin.Android app
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Azure App Service and Azure Notification Hubs to send push notifications to your Xamarin.Android app

trans-unit.source: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.Android app
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications to your Xamarin.Android app

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you add push notifications to the [Xamarin.Android quickstart] project so that every time a record is inserted, a push notification is sent.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you add push notifications to the [Xamarin.Android quickstart] project so that every time a record is inserted, a push notification is sent.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial is based on the [Xamarin.Android quickstart] tutorial, which you must complete first.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is based on the [Xamarin.Android quickstart] tutorial, which you must complete first.

trans-unit.source: If you do not use the downloaded quick start server project, you must add the push notification extension package to your project.
trans-unit.target: If you do not use the downloaded quick start server project, you must add the push notification extension package to your project.

trans-unit.source: For more information about server extension packages, see [Work with the .NET backend server SDK for Azure Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-server-sdk.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about server extension packages, see [Work with the .NET backend server SDK for Azure Mobile Apps](app-service-mobile-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-server-sdk.md).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This tutorial requires the following:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial requires the following:

trans-unit.source: An active Google account.
trans-unit.target: An active Google account.

trans-unit.source: You can sign up for a Google account at [accounts.google.com](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=268302).
trans-unit.target: You can sign up for a Google account at [accounts.google.com](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=268302).

trans-unit.source: [Google Cloud Messaging Client Component](http://components.xamarin.com/view/GCMClient/).
trans-unit.target: [Google Cloud Messaging Client Component](http://components.xamarin.com/view/GCMClient/).

trans-unit.source: You will add this component during the tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You will add this component during the tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Completed [Xamarin.Android quickstart] tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Completed [Xamarin.Android quickstart] tutorial.

trans-unit.source: Create a Notification Hub
trans-unit.target: Create a Notification Hub

trans-unit.source: Enable Google Cloud Messaging
trans-unit.target: Enable Google Cloud Messaging

trans-unit.source: Configure the Mobile App backend to send push requests
trans-unit.target: Configure the Mobile App backend to send push requests

trans-unit.source: Update the server project to send push notifications
trans-unit.target: Update the server project to send push notifications

trans-unit.source: Configure the client project for push notifications
trans-unit.target: Configure the client project for push notifications

trans-unit.source: Add push notifications code to your app
trans-unit.target: Add push notifications code to your app

trans-unit.source: Test push notifications in your app
trans-unit.target: Test push notifications in your app

trans-unit.source: You can test the app by using a virtual device in the emulator.
trans-unit.target: You can test the app by using a virtual device in the emulator.

trans-unit.source: There are additional configuration steps required when running on an emulator.
trans-unit.target: There are additional configuration steps required when running on an emulator.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you are deploying to or debugging on a virtual device that has Google APIs set as the target, as shown below in the Android Virtual Device (AVD) manager.
trans-unit.target: Make sure that you are deploying to or debugging on a virtual device that has Google APIs set as the target, as shown below in the Android Virtual Device (AVD) manager.

trans-unit.source: Add a Google account to the Android device by clicking **Apps** > **Settings** > **Add account**, then follow the prompts to use add an existing Google account to the device to create a new one.
trans-unit.target: Add a Google account to the Android device by clicking **Apps** > **Settings** > **Add account**, then follow the prompts to use add an existing Google account to the device to create a new one.

trans-unit.source: Run the todolist app as before and insert a new todo item.
trans-unit.target: Run the todolist app as before and insert a new todo item.

trans-unit.source: This time, a notification icon is displayed in the notification area.
trans-unit.target: This time, a notification icon is displayed in the notification area.

trans-unit.source: You can open the notification drawer to view the full text of the notification.
trans-unit.target: You can open the notification drawer to view the full text of the notification.
